评论概述: Stylish, Comfortable, and Perfect for Everyday Wear!
评论详情: I recently purchased these Mules, and they’ve quickly become my go-to pair of shoes! These buckle flats are not only stylish but also incredibly comfortable. The design is sleek and chic, making them perfect for both casual outings and more formal occasions.  The slip-on feature is super convenient, and I love how easy they are to wear when I'm in a hurry. The backless loafer design adds a modern touch, and the buckle detail gives them a polished look. Despite being flats, they offer great support, and I've worn them for hours without any discomfort.  The fit was true to size, and the material feels durable, ensuring they’ll last a long time. Whether I'm running errands, heading to the office, or going out with friends, these mules are versatile enough to pair with almost any outfit.  Overall, I’m extremely happy with my purchase and would highly recommend these mules to anyone looking for a blend of comfort, style, and quality.

These shoes are amazing. Do yourself a favor and order in every color you like. Extremely comfortable, stylish and affordable?! Sign me up. I ordered black size 9, maybe MAYBE could have done a 9.5. I’m ordering as many pairs as I can this time around. Amazing!!!

I ended up returning these after trying them on. The front fabric part is not very thick and you could definitely see some toe outline when worn, so I had a feeling they wouldn't last long regardless. Actually, they weren't thick all-around, even the bottom sole. They were on the less expensive side and looked like it in-person (the metal pedant wasn't great to look at).  I've heard the brand, MUSSHOE, isn't half bad, but these shoes were, unfortunately, not worth keeping.
These are great for work shoes.

评论概述: Decent Shoes with Room for Improvement
评论详情: The MUSSHOE Mules for Women are stylish and comfortable for work wear. The buckle adds a nice touch, and they are easy to slip on. However, these shoes absorb all odors it can get. Unfortunately, I've worn these when it's rained and it will keep the scent of grass and rain no matter how many times you spray the shoes. It's hard to wash because of it's quality and the fabric, but if you were to keep it in the office for work use, it will be fine. Overall, a decent pair of flats with room for improvement.

I ordered these last minute for a work trip. Had zero time to wear them prior to literally just throwing them in my suitcase. For four long days in the humidity and rain of Chicago during the summer time they were SO comfortable.  Not only were they comfortable they really went well with all levels of business casual to more professional. I typically wear heels so I felt very self conscious about ordering flats but I was going to job sites with grass so I had no option - once wearing them my self conscious issues went away. I ordered the nude suede shoes and was worried they'd end up with grass stains but NOPE. I'm seriously impressed with style, comfort and affordability. Not sure how long they'll last but no signs of serious wear after 4 very long and exhausting days..regardless for the price I would buy again. Highly recommend.

I LOVE THESE MULES! I have two pairs and they’re so comfortable, that I bought them for my wedding shoes. They’re not heavy and they cover enough of the top of your foot that you don’t feel like you’re going to fall out of them. Here’s a hack: if you have to wear them for a long time, spray the top of your feet with cheap hair spray and while it’s still tacky out the shoes on.
